entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
